description: Links a document chunk to its parent case/document

sequence_number.description: Order of chunk in the document (1-indexed)

section_name.description: Name of the document section this chunk belongs to

page_number.description: Page number in the original document

importance_score.description: Relative importance of chunk within the case (0-1)

indexes: CREATE INDEX chunk_of_sequence IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:CHUNK_OF]-() ON (r.sequence_number)
